sen.e: Igo no sei is a spirit of Igo which is described in old books and so on from the Edo Period.

sen.e: When Sakuan asked what their names were, the dark complexioned man answered 'I am Chigen living in the mountain' and the fair complexioned man answered 'I am Chihaku living near the ocean', and they had disappeared since.
